14098.「芸で得られる よろこびなんか まやかしだぜ。\n 覚えとけ。芸は なんの役にも:
The pleasure you feel from your tricks is
nothing more than a trick itself. Tricks are
utterly useless! Remember that!

14099.「……へへ 誰かと思ったら <cs_pchero>か。\n 会いたかったぜ とー:
Well, well... Look who it is.
I was reeeeally hoping I'd see you again.

14100.「ポルファンの元で 修行してるってことは\n お前も ご立派な教えに共感してんだ:
Since you are training under Polfan...
am I wrong to assume you share his beliefs?

14101.「芸は 人を救えるって アレだよ。:
You know...about tricks being able to save
people.

14102.「……ハンッ クソが！ イライラさせやがる！\n どいつもこいつも甘ちゃんで ヘ:
...What a load of bunk! It drives me mad!
They're all so naive...it makes me SICK!

14103.「オレは 芸の無力さに絶望し\n 闇芸人ルルルリーチ様に 尽くすと決めたのだ！:
The powerlessness of my tricks filled me with
much despair... That is why I chose to devote
myself to Master Relulu!

14104.「いくぞ 弟弟子 <cs_pchero>よ！\n 本当に芸で人を救えるのなら\n:
<cs_pchero>, my junior!
If you truly believe that tricks can save
people, then prove it! Right here, right now!

14105.「……ククク。なかなか やるな。\n だが それでは オレは止められんぞ。:
Keh heh heh... You're pretty good.
But it's not nearly enough to stop me.

14106.悪魔道化師ゲイザーの身体のキズが\n見る見るうちに ふさがっていく。: Clowngazer's wounds begin to heal rapidly!

14107.「オレは 旅芸人を抹殺するため\n 何度 ケガを負っても 復活する身体を\n ル:
Master Relulu gave me this body. It can
recover no matter how many times it's injured.
All for the sake of killing minstrels!

14108.「弟弟子よ。お前の芸が いつわりでないのなら\n 芸で人を救えるというのなら ポ:
If your tricks are true...if you can really
save people with them... Then do as Polfan
told you! Finish this with a pratfall!

14109.「……芸で 人なんか救えねえ。 \n それがわかるまで 何百回でも 何千回でも\:
...You can't save people with tricks. I will
crush you a hundred, noーa THOUSAND times
over until you understand that!

14111.「ポルファンの言葉が いつわりでないのなら\n このオレを 止めてみせろ！:
If Polfan's words really are true...then just
try and stop me!

14112.「……やるじゃねえか。弟弟子よ。\n お前の芸 確かに見せてもらったぜ。:
Not bad at all...
I've seen your tricks, and now I'm
convinced...

14113.「いいボケだった……。: That was a very good pratfall...

14114.「ひさしぶりに 人間のころの笑いを思いだした。\n ははっ なかなか 面白かった:
It's been so long since I've been able to
laugh as a human... Haha... That really was
funny, you know...

14115.「あ～あ せっかく キミの中にあった\n 芸を憎む心を 利用してあげたのに。\n:
Ah, too bad... I went through all that trouble
to use the hatred festering within you.
And you still lost so easily...

14116.「ルルルリーチ様は 人間のわりに\n 邪悪なオーラを持っていた キミを気に入って:
Master Relulu turned you into a monster
because he took an interest in that evil
aura of yours...despite you being human.

14117.「もう 用済みだねぇ。\n だいぶ 旅芸人を殺してくれたみたいだし\n そろそろ:
We've no use for you anymore.
You've killed plenty of minstrels, so now
it's time for you to die, too!

14118.「そ～れ！ 燃えちゃえ～♪\n ３連続 メラゾーマ～♪:
Time to burn, burn, burn! ♪
Kafrizz, Kafrizz, Kafrizz! ♪

14121.「うっひょ～ これは死んだね～♪\n 見てるだけで熱そう♪ 痛そう♪:
Yee hee! He's dead, he's dead! ♪
You look pretty burnt up...
Hurts, doesn't it? ♪

14122.「ケケケ♪ ケケケ♪: Kee hee hee, kee hee hee...

14124.「み みせてくれ。\n さい…ごに お前…の芸を…。:
One last time...
Show me...that trick...

14128.「はは……。そう…いえば\n 母の…死に顔は おだやか…だった。:
Haha... Now...that I think about it...
My mother, when she...died... Her face...
it looked so peaceful...

14129.「……きっと 母…も\n 師匠の芸を見て……こんな風に\n 安心して…旅立ったん:
My mother... When she saw Polfan's tricks...
I'm sure that she...felt at ease...just like
this...

14130.「……ははっ まい…ったな。\n これが 芸は…人を救うということか。:
Haha... Guess I...lost...
So...this is how...tricks can save people...

14131.「師匠……。オレが まち…がってたよ。\n あな…たは 確かに 芸で…人を……\:
I was wrong... Polfan... Your tricks...
they really did...save someone...
